item.title: JOBY
item.description: score:1050 Chances: Joby Aviation (NYSE: JOBY) issued its Q2 2023 Shareholder Letter with operational and financial results. The company is developing all-electric aircraft for commercial passenger service. Joby Aviation submitted Certification Plans to the FAA, progressing toward certifying its aircraft for commercial use.
